activities:
BROWZ LLC and its affiliates collect limited information to assist BROWZ clients ("clients") who subscribe to the BROWZ Supply Chain Verification Service in evaluating and verifying the performance and contractual compliance of their current and prospective vendors, service providers, suppliers and sub-contractors ("suppliers") who participate in the BROWZ Service.
The core of our business is the limited sharing of certain basic business information, including information verified by us, so that our clients can rely on the qualifications and compliance of their suppliers who participate in the BROWZ Service. Participating suppliers also benefit from reduced costs by eliminating the need to provide duplicate information and documentation in paper form to their current and prospective customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We agree to cooperate and comply with the EU DPAs and the Swiss FDPIC and have paid applicable fees to United States Council for International Business
